Ordered these for a Noodle costume (Gorillaz). I was concerned if I would be able to pop the lenses in and out of these, based on other reviews. I found that some of these were easy to pop out, others not so much. I was going for using the silver frame, but was unable to pop out the correct lens, so wound up having to use the gold frame instead. It’s just a crap shoot, I think, as to whether or not you’re going to successfully pop lenses in and out. They are on the flimsy side, but served their purpose. I put the rest in our costume closet for future use.
